name: P40
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. An unfamiliar dark sedan, license plate visible, tinted windows, parks in driveway. The car parks, both driver and passenger exit and walk toward the house together. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
